item.title: Hora mais legível no dmesg
item.author: Sidnei Weber
item.description: Saída padrão do dmesg: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 [ 7515.054630] CPU7: Core temperature above threshold, cpu clock throttled (total events = 29938) [ 7515.055666] CPU3: Core temperature/speed normal [ 7515.055668] CPU7: Core temperature/speed normal [ 9253.929870] CPU4: Core temperature above threshold, cpu clock throttled (total events = 5697) [ 9253.929873] CPU0: Core temperature above threshold, cpu clock throttled (total events = 5697) [ 9253.930911] CPU4: Core temperature/speed normal [ 9253.
